trans-unit.source: Provides a drop shadow for display by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma sombra para exibição por classes <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> displays a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph> if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.ShowDropShadow%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> exibe um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph> se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.ShowDropShadow%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo é associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se o glifo aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites para o glifo no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração de prioridade do glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph" /> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa a configuração de prioridade para a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph" /> na superfície do designer de atividade.
